items.content_html: EasyTracker ‚Äì Smart Time Tracking & Project Management for Freelancers A lightweight and intuitive web app for tracking work sessions, managing clients and projects, setting custom tags, receiving smart reminders (including SMS), and generating detailed reports. Integrates with Google Calendar and invoicing platforms to streamline your workflow.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: An advanced AI-powered fake news detection system that verifies text, images, and social media posts using Gemini AI, FastAPI, and Next.js. Includes a modern web interface, a lightweight Streamlit app, and a Chrome extension for real-time fake content detection. Built to combat misinformation with explainable AI results and contextual source links.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
